p.s: Tool to generate MySQL UDF extensions from an XML description
p.d: CodeGen_MySQL_UDF is a code generator for MySQL User Defined Function (UDF) extensions similar to PECL_Gen for PHP. It reads in configuration options, function prototypes and code fragments from an XML description file and generates a complete ready-to-compile UDF extension. Preliminary documentation can be found here: http://talks.php.net/show/UDF_Gen
